text.div:
GAO Result Code

Codes indicating the appropriateness of an order based upon established clinical guidelines.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/evaluation-result-code defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
within Within GuidelinesOrder is within identified guidelines.
outside Outside GuidelinesOrder is outside identified guidelines.
noguidelines No Guidelines ApplyNo guidelines apply to order.
incomplete Evaluation not completed.Evaluation was not completed (e.g., because more information is necessary).
manual Manual EvaluationThe evaluation was issued through a manual process.
notcovered Not coveredNo evaluation was performed as the requested service is not covered for this patient.

name: GAO Result Code
description: Codes indicating the appropriateness of an order based upon established clinical guidelines.
requirements: These values are needed to report the results of an evaluation of appropriateness for an order based upon specified guidelines.

concept.definition: Evaluation was not completed (e.g., because more information is necessary).
The evaluation was issued through a manual process.
No evaluation was performed as the requested service is not covered for this patient.
